# Enforce database table names to follow the configured style (`@v2nic/prisma/db-table-name-style`)

<!-- end auto-generated rule header -->

## Options

<!-- begin auto-generated rule options list -->

| Name           | Description                                                                             | Type     | Default      |
| :------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :------- | :----------- |
| `ignoreModels` | Model names to skip when validating database table names.                               | String[] | `[]`         |
| `style`        | Case-insensitive. Accepts snake_case, camel_case, pascal_case, or screaming_snake_case. | String   | `snake_case` |

<!-- end auto-generated rule options list -->
